statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_metadata
SELECT transaction_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transaction_metadata WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000'
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transaction_metadata WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM transaction_metadata WHERE sender_id = '987e6543-21d7-84a6-b231-546234657896' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transaction_metadata WHERE sender_id = 'abc12345-6789-45d3-8267-098765432100' AND amount < 500 ORDER BY receiver_id ASC
SELECT * FROM transaction_metadata ORDER BY amount ASC, sender_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_metadata WHERE sender_id = 'abc-12345';
SELECT * FROM transaction_metadata WHERE receiver_id = 'xyz-98765' AND amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transaction_metadata WHERE sender_id = 'def-67890' OR receiver_id = 'ghi-54321';
SELECT transaction_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM transaction_metadata WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY sender_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY sender_id ASC
SELECT * FROM transaction_metadata WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, notes FROM transaction_metadata ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND receiver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, notes FROM transaction_metadata WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN transaction_metadata ON transactions.transaction_id = transaction_metadata.transaction_id WHERE transactions.amount < 500 AND transaction_metadata.notes LIKE '%important%';
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' OR receiver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003';
SELECT * FROM transaction_metadata;
SELECT sender_name, sender_email FROM sender_info;
SELECT receiver_name FROM receiver_info WHERE receiver_id = 1;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transaction_metadata WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transaction_metadata ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_metadata WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT sender_name, amount FROM sender_info JOIN transaction_metadata ON sender_info.sender_id = transaction_metadata.sender_id
SELECT receiver_name, receiver_email FROM receiver_info WHERE receiver_id = 5

SELECT sender_name, receiver_name, amount FROM sender_info JOIN transaction_metadata ON sender_info.sender_id = transaction_metadata.sender_id JOIN receiver_info ON transaction_metadata.receiver_id = receiver_info.receiver_id
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_metadata GROUP BY sender_id
SELECT * FROM transaction_metadata;
SELECT transaction_id, sender, receiver, amount FROM transaction_metadata;
SELECT sender_name, sender_email FROM sender_metadata WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT receiver_id, receiver_name, receiver_address FROM receiver_metadata WHERE receiver_phone LIKE '555%';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT sender, receiver, amount FROM transaction_metadata;
SELECT sender_name, sender_email, sender_phone FROM sender_metadata WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT receiver_name, receiver_address FROM receiver_metadata WHERE receiver_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT transaction_id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM transaction_metadata JOIN transaction_history ON transaction_metadata.transaction_id = transaction_history.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT sender_name, sender_email FROM senders ORDER BY sender_name DESC;
SELECT receiver_name, receiver_email FROM receivers WHERE receiver_id = 3;
SELECT sender_id, total_transactions FROM sender_history WHERE total_amount_sent > 500;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY receiver_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender_name, receiver_name, amount FROM transactions JOIN senders ON transactions.sender_id = senders.sender_id JOIN receivers ON transactions.receiver_id = receivers.receiver_id;

SELECT sender_name, total_transactions, total_amount_sent FROM senders JOIN sender_history ON senders.sender_id = sender_history.sender_id WHERE total_transactions > 10 ORDER BY total_amount_sent DESC;

SELECT receiver_email, total_amount_received FROM receivers JOIN receiver_history ON receivers.receiver_id = receiver_history.receiver_id WHERE total_amount_received > 5000 ORDER BY total_transactions ASC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE sender_id = 3 OR receiver_id = 5 ORDER BY sender_id DESC, receiver_id ASC;
